none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on June 12, 2023 Description from Terminal Escape:
Â I saw ANNAPURA on their recent West Coast tour and I was reeling for fukkn days...until I saw them again and they sent me reeling again. Ferocity and devastation - a modern manifestation of so many of the DBeat tinged hardcore/crust trappings of the last two decades, and seeing them back-to-back with MOXIEBEAT was like going back to school. TO listen to "No Pasaran" is simply to know what the shit is supposed to sound like - ANNAPURA are urgent, they are demanding, the songs are ungodly powerful, and I already can't wait to see them again.NN

seo.title: Annapura - NN - Terminal Escape
